title: Great 2 BR/2.5 BA + Loft Townhouse For Rent
posting_body: This End Unit Townhouse is available August 1  (non-smokers only please).
Gorgeous 2 bedroom plus loft, 2.5 bath townhouse; fully updated throughout, including windows, hardwood flooring, kitchen, baths, and paint.
Open-concept family room with gas log fireplace.
Also included is a washer/dryer in-unit.
Walk-in Closets in the Master BR.
One-car attached garage with a private patio backed against the perimeter tree line.
Close to major highways I-55, I-355, I-294, I-88 and Rt 83 and is in the Hinsdale South High School District.
Rent includes snow removal and lawn maintenance.
Rental details include a $50 non-refundable application fee and a $2100.0 security deposit (one month's rent).
Pets will be considered case by case and utilities are additional.

This Townhouse is close to Argonne National Lab and these suburbs : Hinsdale, Clarendon Hills, Willowbrook, Darien, Downers Grove, Westmont, Burr Ridge, Lemont, Lisle, Naperville, Oakbrook and Lombard.
